Text:
"VACE" sucks, the "scene" sucks.

Here's the latest version: 
http://torrents.humblebundle.com/RetroCityRampageSetup110.exe.torrent
Maybe if you could explain why it "sucks", your claim would have more veracity.

Why make a "scene" release of 1.09 when 1.10 is already out?

The official torrent consists of 1 DRM free installer, this "VACE" torrents contains 6 files, and an unnecessary custom installer.

Suck my veracity.
